named-query.name: CalInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.calendarId

named-query.name: CalInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarInfo a ORDER BY a.calendarId

named-query.name: CalDetailInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarDetailInfo a ORDER BY a.id.calendarId, a.id.orderNo

named-query.name: CalDetailInfoEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarDetailInfo a WHERE a.id.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.id.orderNo

named-query.name: CalDetailInfoEntity.findByCalPatternId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarDetailInfo a WHERE a.calPatternId = :calPatternId ORDER BY a.id.calendarId, a.id.orderNo

named-query.name: CalPatternInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarPatternInfo a ORDER BY a.objectId

named-query.name: CalPatternInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalendarPatternInfo a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.objectId

named-query.name: CalPatternDetailInfoEntity.findByCalendarPatternId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM YMD a WHERE a.id.calPatternId = :calPatternId ORDER BY a.id.calPatternId, a.id.year, a.id.month, a.id.day
